About

Dr Magesh V, is Consultant Interventional Cardiologist and Associate Professor of Cardiology at Meenakshi Medical College, Kanchipuram. He is also running Cardiology service at Om shanthi Heart Care centre, Kanchipuram. He has completed his school education from Pachaiyappas Higher Secondary School Kanchipuram with securing District First in SSLC exams held in the year 1996. He has graduated MBBS from Govt Stanley Medical College chennai in the year 2004. Then he did his Masters MD General Medicine at Madras Medical College& Govt General Hospital in the year 2009. He also did Fellowship in Diabetes from Christian Medical College vellore. Then He successfully completed Super Speciality DM Cardiology Post graduation training from Govt Stanley Medical College chennai in the year 2015. then he underwent Special traing for Interventional Cardiology traing for Cardiac Cathetarization and Coronary Angiograplasty and structural interventions. Apart from Medical Career, he has keen interest in Spreading Scientific Medical information, Health education, Child Education and Social welfare.
